oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Die Staaten von Südost=Europa: Rumänien, Serbien, Montenegro, Bulgarien, Kreta, Europ. Türkei, Griechenland
Uebersichtskarte der Balkanstaaten ... aus Scheda-Steinhausers handatlas
Südost=Europa
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Peucker, Karl , 1859-1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Redigiert v. Dr. K. Peucker ; Rudolph Maschek sculps ; Kartogr. Anst. v. Th. Bannwarth.
Covers Romania, Bosnia and Hercegovina, Montenegro, Bulgaria, Macedonia, Albania, Greece, Cyprus and portions of Russia, Hungary, Croatia and Italy.
Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Depth shown by hachures.
From: Scheda & Steinhauser Atlas. Sudost-Europa (Balkanländer) No. XV.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale 1:3,000,000(E 18°--E 28°/N 47°--N 36°).
